attributes.action: That Northamptonshires rural South gets a better bus/rail facility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The area effeted around Brackley, suffers in a poor with regular links to the county town of Northampton.
The town also had a former rail link which could also be reopened to cater for those wishing to travel to London or the East Midlands.
